segments.text: I buy a computer magazine every month . It keeps me up-to date with all the latest developments .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why don ’ t you find the information on the internet instead ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sometimes it takes too long to find the exact information you are looking for . Besides , I like to read a magazine in a coffee bar sometimes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you have an online edition of that magazine ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , they do . But you can only access all the articles if you have a subscription .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I do . The magazine arrives by post at the beginning of each month . Do you every buy magazines ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I only buy them if they look particularly interesting . I don ’ t buy any regularly .
segments.speaker: S1
